import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { render } from "react-dom"; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addFilter, removeFilter } from "../Redux/productRedux"; import "./CSS/Sidepanel.css"; // import { products } from '../Data' const Sidepanel = () => { const mystyle = { //styling fontWeight: 600, }; const dispatch = useDispatch(); useEffect(() => { const checkbox = document.querySelectorAll(".filter-checkbox"); for (let check of checkbox) { check.addEventListener("click", function (e) { const brand = e.target.value; if (e.target.checked === true) { dispatch(addFilter({ brand })); } else { dispatch(removeFilter({ brand })); } }); } }); // function render(){ // const gender = 'men' // dispatch(addproduct({gender})) // } return (
FILTERS
{" "} {/*styling*/}
BRAND
); }; export default Sidepanel;
